name: Getting Fixed
description:
<img src="https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzEwNDAyNzMxLnBuZw==/original/pHVQ19.png" style="color: inherit; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit;"> This little game is about a little bot trying to do big things. The world is big and for TZ50 its even bigger, follow him on his journey as he discovers that not everything is what it seems and help TZ find what actually going on. 

˙·．.．·˙`˙·．..．· ˙·．.．·˙`˙·．..．· ˙·．.．·˙`˙˙·．.．·˙`·．..．· ˙

Features Movement
  • A,D - move left and right
  • Space - to jump 
  • X - to attack with sword
  • 2x Space Bar - double jump
  • SHIFT - Dash forward or sprint
WORLD
  • Interesting story
  • new characters
  • Anxious puzzles  Fun and exciting puzzles 
  • ADHD Design   with Over the top character's
Design and Brief

This game was design with the objective of helping and understanding mental illness, with everyone in this project having some understanding of what its like to live with Anxiety, Dyslexia, Depression and our favorite ADHD we know not everyone understand how it feels, this game was in hope some way to portray what its like is some sense.

This is a student creation done for our second End year project.

Thanks so much to

Danial Beale - lead Programmer   

Ronan Assor - Lead Art Designer   

Justin Demmer - Game Designer
